ROPGenerator Version 1.0 (beta)

----------------
# Python Version
---------------
ROPGenerator is migrating to python3 but is supported only by python2 so far


--------------
# Dependencies
--------------
ROPGenerator uses the following python packages 
	- z3
	- barf-project
	
ROPGenerator needs the following tools 
	- ROPgadget 
	

----------------------------
# How to launch ROPGenerator
----------------------------
Go in the ropgenerator folder and type 'python ROPGenerator.py' 

----------------------------------------
# How to configure and use ROPGenerator 
----------------------------------------
You can configure your ROPGenerator with the 'config' command
Before using it you should configure the architecture to work with, and the 
path to ROPGagdet tool that will be used to generate gadgets 

Generaly, use the 'help' command to get help
